content: Sitting behind Frank Kaminsky and battling him in practice for a year was HUGE. Interesting how the article photo is him shooting a free throw — he was abysmal all year (under 50%) but then went 10 for 14 in the BIG10 tourney I believe. If he keeps knocking those down we may make a run. Also crazy how this is an article about his versatility yet he’s never even shot a 3 yet and only shot 5 times all year from outside the paint. If he adds one or both of those next year we’re looking at Kaminsky 2.0
